statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (user:HexnodeUser) WHERE human.email = user.email MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_HEXNODE]->(user) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
MATCH (:Human)-[r:IDENTITY_HEXNODE]->(:HexnodeUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
